title: aught in error loop "No Text to summary"
body:
### ⚠️ Search for existing issues first ⚠️

- [X] I have searched the existing issues, and there is no existing issue for my problem

### Which Operating System are you using?

MacOS

### Which version of Auto-GPT are you using?

Latest Release

### GPT-3 or GPT-4?

GPT-4

### Steps to reproduce 🕹

_No response_

### Current behavior 😯

I am running AutoGPT in continuous mode as a test to collect information from the web about a specific topic. However, I always end up in a loop as soon as a website has no text to summarize or has other page errors. As soon as the page cannot be loaded, also because of an index or server error, the loop begins.
AutoGPT restarts the google search, lands on the same page, and starts the search over, only to land on the page again. How can I tell AutoGPT to skip or not reread the website if it's not at the same?

### Expected behavior 🤔

_No response_

### Your prompt 📝

SYSTEM:  Command browse_website returned: ('Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize \n \n Links: []', <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="6933c1f27113911a3f3501b02c9cf7c8")>)
 THOUGHTS:  I will continue browsing the websites of the top 5 DJs in the search results to gather more information about their services, pricing, and availability. I will also check their social media profiles and customer reviews to verify their reputation. Based on this information, I will create a list of the top 5 DJs that meet Laura and Lukas's requirements.
REASONING:  Browsing the websites of the top 5 DJs will provide me with more detailed information about their services, pricing, and availability. Checking their social media profiles and customer reviews will help me to verify their reputation and ensure that they are a good fit for Laura and Lukas's wedding.

-  Create a list of the top 5 DJs that meet Laura and Lukas's requirements
CRITICISM:  I need to ensure that I am thorough in my research and gather as much information as possible to make an informed decision. I also need to be mindful of the time and ensure that I am efficient in my search.
